post.description:
Activate current schema

Internal API, this API is called from Settings service

This API requires **MEASUREMENT_ACTIVATE_SCHEMA** permission(s).

get.summary: Search Raw Measurements entities by filter
get.description:
Search Raw Measurements entities by filter

Returns list of Raw Measurements, the response can be filtered, sorted and supports pagination


## Filter
Each additionalProp can filter one field, inside additionalProp there are many optional conditions that can be used for filtering that field

When multiple conditions are specified, they are bundled together using logical AND operators, this means that only the items that match all filter conditions for that field will be returned

***filter*** items possible values: [ *_patient.id - Eq only*,*timestamp*,*attributes - in only* ] 

## Sort
Results can be sorted by multiple fields, the order of the fields in the sort request governs the hierarchy of the sort

The first field is the primary sort, the second is used when two values of the first field are the same, and so forth

***sort.order*** default value is DESC

***sort.prop*** possible values:[  ]

If sort was not specified, the result will be sorted by: creationTime DESC

## Free text search
When freeTextSearch is passed, the free text search will be performed on every field except those of type Date

If used together with filters, freeTextSearch will be bundled to the filters with the logical AND operator, this means that only items that match all filters (and each filter's conditions) and the free text search will be returned

## Page
***limit*** max number of results that will be returned for each page. If not specify, the default will be 100

***page*** page number starting from 0. If not specify, the default will be 0

## Build URL
Encode the JSON object and use the encoded string as the searchRequest parameter:

https://<URL>?searchRequest=<ENCODED_JSON_STRING>

_patient.id support only 'eq' operator, timestamp support only 'from' & 'to' operators. - these operators are also mandatory. attributes supports only 'in' operator

Query Parameters:

| Parameter   |Type   | Mandatory| Description          | Example   |
|-------------|-------|----------|----------------------|-----------|
|searchRequest||true|Search request parameters: filter, sort and page||


This API requires **PROTECTED_API** permission(s).

parameters.name: searchRequest
parameters.description: Search request parameters: filter, sort and page

400.description:
Code : MISSING_MANDATORY_FILTER, Details: [filter]

Code : TIMESTAMP_FROM_TO_MISSING, Details: []

Code : PATIENT_ID_EQ_MISSING, Details: []

Code : TIME_BEFORE_MIN_TIME, Details: [startTime, endTime, minTime]

Code : INVALID_TIME_RANGE, Details: [startTime, currentTime, endTime]

200.description:
The below table describes the response parameters:

| Parameter   |Type   |Description          | Example   |
|-------------|-------|---------------------|-----------|
|data|array|List of items that match the search request||
|data[index].patientId|string|||
|data[index].sessionId|string|||
|data[index].sourceEntityId|string|||
|data[index].timestamp|string|||
|data[index].data|object|||
|metadata.sort|array|Sort that was passed in the request||
|metadata.sort[index].prop|string|The property name for the sort||
|metadata.sort[index].order|string|The direction of sort. Default DESC Values:ASC,DESC||
|metadata.filter|object|The filter that was passed in the request||
|metadata.nextToken|string|Next token that should be supplied when requesting a new page, empty of there are no next page||
|metadata.limitPerPage|integer|Limit of items||

get.description:
Get current schema

Get all attributes in current schema - attributes that appeared already saved and defined in DB

This API requires **MEASUREMENT_GET_SCHEMA** permission(s).

delete.description:
Delete current schema from DB

All data from DB table will be deleted.

Internal API, this API is called from Settings service

This API requires **MEASUREMENT_DELETE_SCHEMA** permission(s).

get.description:
Get raw measurements



Get all measurements for attributes and time

Query Parameters:

| Parameter   |Type   | Mandatory| Description          | Example   |
|-------------|-------|----------|----------------------|-----------|
|flatRequest|null|true|null||


This API requires **PROTECTED_API** permission(s).

400.description:
Code : INVALID_TIME_RANGE, Details: [startTime, currentTime, endTime]

Code : ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUND, Details: [attributeNames]

Code : ATTRIBUTE_IS_NOT_AGGREGATABLE, Details: [attributesAggregatable]

Code : TIME_BEFORE_MIN_TIME, Details: [startTime, endTime, minTime]

Code : EXCEED_MAX_TIME_RANGE, Details: [startTime, endTime, maxTimeRange]

Code : ATTRIBUTE_IS_NOT_ALLOWED, Details: [attributes]

200.description:
The below table describes the response parameters:

| Parameter   |Type   |Description          | Example   |
|-------------|-------|---------------------|-----------|
|attributes|array|||
|attributes[index].attributeName|string|||
|attributes[index].sources|array|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].sourceEntityId|string|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].measurementSessions|array|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].measurementSessions[index].sessionId|string|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].measurementSessions[index].measurements|array|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].measurementSessions[index].measurements[index].timestamp|string|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].measurementSessions[index].measurements[index].frequency|integer|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].measurementSessions[index].measurements[index].numberOfSample|integer|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].measurementSessions[index].measurements[index].data|array|||

get.summary: Search Last Measurements entities by filter
get.description:
Search Last Measurements entities by filter

Returns list of Last Measurements, the response can be filtered, sorted and supports pagination


## Filter
Each additionalProp can filter one field, inside additionalProp there are many optional conditions that can be used for filtering that field

When multiple conditions are specified, they are bundled together using logical AND operators, this means that only the items that match all filter conditions for that field will be returned

***filter*** items possible values: [ *_patient.id* ] 

## Sort
Results can be sorted by multiple fields, the order of the fields in the sort request governs the hierarchy of the sort

The first field is the primary sort, the second is used when two values of the first field are the same, and so forth

***sort.order*** default value is DESC

***sort.prop*** possible values:[ *creationTime* ]

If sort was not specified, the result will be sorted by: creationTime DESC

## Free text search
When freeTextSearch is passed, the free text search will be performed on every field except those of type Date

If used together with filters, freeTextSearch will be bundled to the filters with the logical AND operator, this means that only items that match all filters (and each filter's conditions) and the free text search will be returned

## Page
***limit*** max number of results that will be returned for each page. If not specify, the default will be 100

***page*** page number starting from 0. If not specify, the default will be 0

## Build URL
Encode the JSON object and use the encoded string as the searchRequest parameter:

https://<URL>?searchRequest=<ENCODED_JSON_STRING>

Query Parameters:

| Parameter   |Type   | Mandatory| Description          | Example   |
|-------------|-------|----------|----------------------|-----------|
|searchRequest||false|Search request parameters: filter, sort and page||


This API requires **MEASUREMENT_GET_LAST_MEASUREMENTS** permission(s).

parameters.name: searchRequest
parameters.description: Search request parameters: filter, sort and page

200.description:
The below table describes the response parameters:

| Parameter   |Type   |Description          | Example   |
|-------------|-------|---------------------|-----------|
|data|array|List of items that match the search request||
|data[index].patientId|string|||
|data[index].lastMeasurements.measurementsRecords|object|||
|data[index].creationTime|string|A UTC date-time in the ISO-8601 format|2007-12-20T10:15:30Z|
|data[index].lastModifiedTime|string|A UTC date-time in the ISO-8601 format|2007-12-20T10:15:30Z|
|metadata.sort|array|Sort that was passed in the request||
|metadata.sort[index].prop|string|The property name for the sort||
|metadata.sort[index].order|string|The direction of sort. Default DESC Values:ASC,DESC||
|metadata.filter|object|The filter that was passed in the request||
|metadata.page.totalResults|integer|The total number of items that match the query|145|
|metadata.page.page|integer|Page number|3|
|metadata.page.limit|integer|Number of items per page|100|
|metadata.freeTextSearch|string|Free text search strings that was passed in the request|cat dog|

get.description:
Get aggregated measurements



Get all measurements for attributes and time

Query Parameters:

| Parameter   |Type   | Mandatory| Description          | Example   |
|-------------|-------|----------|----------------------|-----------|
|flatRequest|null|true|null||


This API requires **PROTECTED_API** permission(s).

400.description:
Code : INVALID_TIME_RANGE, Details: [startTime, currentTime, endTime]

Code : ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUND, Details: [attributeNames]

Code : ATTRIBUTE_IS_NOT_AGGREGATABLE, Details: [attributesAggregatable]

Code : INVALID_BIN_INTERVAL, Details: [binIntervalSeconds]

Code : TIME_BEFORE_MIN_TIME, Details: [startTime, endTime, minTime]

200.description:
The below table describes the response parameters:

| Parameter   |Type   |Description          | Example   |
|-------------|-------|---------------------|-----------|
|attributes|array|||
|attributes[index].attributeName|string|||
|attributes[index].sources|array|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].sourceEntityId|string|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].measurementSessions|array|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].measurementSessions[index].sessionId|string|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].measurementSessions[index].measurements|array|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].measurementSessions[index].measurements[index].timestamp|string|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].measurementSessions[index].measurements[index].average|number|||
|attributes[index].sources[index].measurementSessions[index].measurements[index].standardDeviation|number|||

get.summary: Check if custom/built-in attributes and template are in use.
get.description:
Check if custom/built-in attributes and template are in use.

Internal API, called by the Settings service when modifying template

This API requires **TEMPLATES_IS_TEMPLATE_AND_ATTRIBUTE_IN_USE** permission(s).

parameters.name: entityTypeName
parameters.description: Entity type name of the given template

parameters.name: attributeName
parameters.description: List of attributes (name) that will be checked

get.summary: Check if the service has only built in data.
get.description:
Check if the service has only built in data.

Internal API, called by the Settings service when validating that the environment is cleaned

This API requires **TEMPLATES_HAS_BUILT_IN_DATA** permission(s).

Service Health check API

The API returns 200 if the service is up, used by the Load Balancer

This API is **public**.

in.description: List of values for the IN operator

items.description: List of values for the IN operator

eq.description: Value for the EQUAL (=) operator, string, numeric, boolean or object

lt.description: Value for the LESS THAN (<) operator, numeric value only

lte.description: Value for the LESS THAN OR EQUAL operator (<=), numeric value only

gt.description: Value for the GREATER THAN operator (>), numeric value only

gte.description: Value for the GREATER THAN OR EQUAL operator (>=), numeric value only

like.description: Value for the CONTAINS operator (substring), string value only

from.description: Value for the DATE RANGE FROM operator, date value only,A UTC date in the ISO-8601 format

to.description: Value for the DATE RANGE TO operator, date value only,A UTC date in the ISO-8601 format

isNull.description: If set to true, checks if the field's value is null

isNotNull.description: If set to true, checks if the field's value is not null

not.description: Value for the NOT EQUAL (!=) operator, string, numeric, boolean or object

notIn.description: List of values for the NOT IN operator

items.description: List of values for the NOT IN operator

FilterV2.description: Each additionalProp can filter one field, inside additionalProp there are many optional conditions that can be used for filtering that field. When multiple conditions are specified, they are bundled together using logical AND operators, this means that only the items that match all filter conditions for that field will be returned

prop.description: The property name for the sort

order.description: The direction of sort. Default DESC

Order.description: Results can be sorted by multiple fields, the order of the fields in the sort request governs the hierarchy of the sort.The first field is the primary sort, the second is used when two values of the first field are the same, and so forth

filter.description: Each additionalProp can filter one field, inside additionalProp there are many optional conditions that can be used for filtering that field. When multiple conditions are specified, they are bundled together using logical AND operators, this means that only the items that match all filter conditions for that field will be returned

sort.description: Results can be sorted by multiple fields, the order of the fields in the sort request governs the hierarchy of the sort.The first field is the primary sort, the second is used when two values of the first field are the same, and so forth
Sort that was passed in the request

filter.description: The filter that was passed in the request

nextToken.description: Next token that should be supplied when requesting a new page, empty of there are no next page

data.description: List of items that match the search request

filter.description: Each additionalProp can filter one field, inside additionalProp there are many optional conditions that can be used for filtering that field. When multiple conditions are specified, they are bundled together using logical AND operators, this means that only the items that match all filter conditions for that field will be returned

sort.description: Results can be sorted by multiple fields, the order of the fields in the sort request governs the hierarchy of the sort.The first field is the primary sort, the second is used when two values of the first field are the same, and so forth

freeTextSearch.description: Free text search strings - will be bundled to the filters with the logical AND operator. Possible to pass a few strings with space between them, the search will return a result if one of strings appears in the data entity (OR operator).
